## List of words and their variants {#appendix-c}

```{r, results = "asis", warning = FALSE}
word_list_data <- readr::read_csv(
  here::here(
    "01_materials", 
    "word_list", 
    "input", 
    "spelling_and_pronunciations.csv"
  )
) %>%
  select(transparent_spelling:contrastive_pronunciation) %>%
  replace_na(list(contrastive_pronunciation = ""))

kable(
  word_list_data,
  format = "latex",
  booktabs = TRUE, 
  caption = "Word list used in all experiments. Experiment 1, 2b, and 3 use the opaque spellings, while Experiment 2a uses the transparent spellings.", 
  col.names = c("Transaprent", "Opaque", "Non-Contrastive", "Contrastive"),
  longtable = multipage_table,
  escape = FALSE,
  linesep = "" # avoids spacing every 5 rows
  ) %>%
kable_styling(
  latex_options = c("hold_position", "repeat_header"), 
  full_width = FALSE,
  font_size = table_font_size
) %>%
add_header_above(
  c("Spelling" = 2, "Pronunciation" = 2)
)
```
